caption.p: The Main Types of Thrombsiss Caused by COVID-19.

graphic.alt-text: Diagram showing SARS-CoV-2 virus attacking the lungs and extrapulmonary vascular system, causing thrombus formation. Thrombotic complications include pulmonary embolism, venous thromboembolism, deep vein thrombosis, arterial thrombosis, acute ischemic stroke, myocardial infarction, pulmonary embolism, acute coronary syndrome, renal, spleen, and mesenteric infarction, and acute limb ischemia.
